meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Albany Showdown Over Rent As lawmakers in Albany prepare this week for the first test of a move to end rent control, attention is focused on six lawmakers who could decide the issue. Pages B1 and B6.
Microsoft Reaches for TV Microsoft will buy WebTV Networks in an ambitious effort to blend personal computers, television and the Internet. Page D1.
Albany Showdown Over Rent As lawmakers in Albany prepare this week for the first test of a move to end rent control, attention is focused on six lawmakers who could decide the issue. Pages B1 and B6.
Microsoft Reaches for TV Microsoft will buy WebTV Networks in an ambitious effort to blend personal computers, television and the Internet. Page D1.
August Heckscher Dies August Heckscher, a Parks Commissioner under Mayor Lindsay who was also active in many civic causes, has died at 83. Page B9.
